name: Early Prologue Repel Gel
description: Hidden item block above a stone block in prologue. You can jump up on top of this block and either use Kooper or Bombette to get the item from the block.

name: Odd Key Early
description: Obtain the item inside the blue house early. Just stand next to where the Odd Key is outside the blue house, face right, spin, hold left, and hammer.

name: Blue House Skip
description: Get access to the blue house sewer pipe early. There are various methods to do so without any items/partners (see link), but you can also do a regular laki clip on the bottom/right corner of the house.

name: Enter ToyBox without Bow
description: Enter ToyBox without Bow by using the blue Toad to go out of bounds and move in front of the box.

name: Enter Storeroom without key (Parakarry)
description: Get access to the storeroom by clipping in the shop wall with Parakarry.

name: Enter Storeroom without key (Hammer)
description: Get access to the storeroom by using the blue Toad to go out of bounds and move inside the storeroom, similar to 'Enter ToyBox Without Bow'.

name: Whale Early (LZS)
description: Enter the whale without hitting it through LZS. Only useful when starting hamerless.

name: Sushie-less Toad Town Star Piece
description: After ch4 is completed, you can enter the house and NPC push a Toad toward the wall with Bombette until you can clip out with the hammer.

name: Clippy Boots Stone Block Skip
description: In the path winding path leading to the Ultra Boots chest, the stone block can be bypassed by entering clippy state with Lakilester and jumping on the block, then on top of the door arch.

name: Clippy Boots Metal Block Skip
description: In the room before the Ultra Boots chest, the metal block can be bypassed by entering clippy state with lakilester and jumping on the block, then on top of the door arch.

name: Island Pipe Blooper Skip
description: Reach and activate the pipe to Yoshi's Island without Sushie or east side sewer access by clipping out of bounds with lakilester.

name: Parakarry-less Sewer Star Piece
description: With Kooper and a precise jump, the star piece in Toad Town Tunnels can be grabbed without Parakarry.

name: Sewer Blocks without Ultra Boots
description: By gaining height from jumping on a Dark Koopa, the highest blocks in the sewers can be reached with regular boots. This trick also works for the 3 blocks in the room before the Ultra Boots chest.

name: Kooper-less Pleasant Path Star Piece (clippy)
description: By entering clippy state with Lakilester, it is possible to go out of bounds and reach the island star piece without Kooper.

name: Invisible Bridge Clip (NoLaki)
description: The bridge before Koopa Bros Fortress can be passed without Kooper by going out of bounds with precise jumps and movement.

name: Invisible Bridge Clip (Laki)
description: The bridge before Koopa Bros Fortress can be passed without Kooper by clipping through the fence with Lakilester.

name: Kooper-less Pleasant Path Thunder Bolt
description: The Brick Block on Pleasant Path can be broken without Kooper by baiting a Spiked Goomba under the block and jumping on it.

name: Bombette-less KBF FP Plus (LZS)
description: Using LZS, the FP Plus chest in front of Koopa Bros Fortress can be reached without bombing the wall and using the pipe.

name: Laki Jailbreak
description: Using Lakilester, it is possible to clip into the left jail cell and then use a Laki Jump to reach the upper left door.

name: Water Staircase Skip
description: In the first interior room of Koopa Bros Fortress, you can get out of bounds with Lakilester and reach the
